00022    // Define the Zero Tensor
00023    const Tensor Tensor::Zero = Tensor(0.0);
00024 
00028    void Tensor::initStatic()
00029    {
00030      int nCall = 0;
00031      if (nCall > 0) UTIL_THROW("Tensor::initStatic called more than once");
00032      ++nCall;
00033    }
00034 
00035    // Equality operators
00036    
00037    #define EPSILON 1.0E-8
00038    
00039    bool operator==(const Tensor& t1, const Tensor& t2) 
00040    {
00041       for (int i = 0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00042          if ( fabs(t1.elem_[i] - t2.elem_[i]) > EPSILON) {
00043             return false;
00044          }
00045       }
00046       return true;
00047    }
00048    
00049    bool operator==(const Tensor& t1, const double a2[][Dimension]) 
00050    {
00051       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00052          for (int j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00053             if ( fabs(t1(i, j) - a2[i][j]) > EPSILON) {
00054                return false;
00055             }
00056          }
00057       }
00058       return true;
00059    }
00060    
00061    #undef EPSILON
00062    
00063    bool operator==(const double a1[][Dimension], const Tensor& t2) 
00064    { return (t2 == a1); }
00065    
00066    // Inequality operators
00067    
00068    bool operator!=(const Tensor& t1, const Tensor& t2) 
00069    { return !(t1 == t2); }
00070    
00071    bool operator!=(const Tensor& t1, const double a2[][Dimension]) 
00072    { return !(t1 == a2); }
00073    
00074    bool operator!=(const double a1[][Dimension], const Tensor& t2) 
00075    { return !(t2 == a1); }
00076    
00077    /* 
00078    * Extract a Tensor from an istream.
00079    */
00080    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, Tensor &tensor)
00081    {
00082       for (int i=0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00083          in >> tensor.elem_[i];
00084       }
00085       return in;
00086    }
00087    
00088    /* 
00089    * Output a Tensor to an ostream, without line breaks.
00090    */
00091    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Tensor &tensor) 
00092    {
00093       for (int i=0; i < DimensionSq; ++i) {
00094          out.setf(std::ios::scientific);
00095          out.width(Tensor::Width);
00096          out.precision(Tensor::Precision);
00097          out << tensor.elem_[i];
00098       }
00099       return out;
00100    }

00102    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00103 
00107    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<Tensor>::type = MPI::BYTE;
00108    bool MpiTraits<Tensor>::hasType = false;
00109 
00113    void Tensor::commitMpiType() 
00114    {
00115       if (!MpiTraits<Tensor>::hasType) {
00116          MpiStructBuilder builder;
00117          Tensor           tensor;
00118          int              i, j;
00119    
00120          builder.setBase(&tensor);
00121          for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00122             for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00123                builder.addMember(&tensor(i, j), MPI::DOUBLE);
00124             }
00125          }
00126          builder.commit(MpiTraits<Tensor>::type);
00127          MpiTraits<Tensor>::hasType = true;
00128       }
00129    }
00130    #endif
00131 
00132 }
